display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Gives the Stalker a chance to enter a hidden state when they strike their target with the slotted power and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This effect will trigger roughly 4 times per minute. This enhancement can only be slotted by Stalkers and can be slotted into nearly all Stalker damage powers.
